ModMetaData.name: [ZEN] Vanilla Security Retextured
ModMetaData.author: Poet
ModMetaData.description:
This retexture mod changes the graphics for these vanilla security items:
- Spike Trap
- IED EMP Trap / Shell - IED Firefoam Trap / Shell - IED Smokepop Trap / Shell - IED Incendiary Trap / Shell - IED Heavy Explosives Trap / Shell - IED Antigrain Warhead Trap / Shell
- New projectile graphics for all mortar shells.
Also changes the graphics for these items from other mods:
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security | Landmine
